TopicTitle: Electric lights cast no shadows, but sun shadows work

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I believe this is a general KSP bug...

Electric Kerbal lights (Illuminator and Kerbal helmet) do not cause parts to cast shadows. Shadows from the sun are working normally for parts and terrain, cascading in any combination. Electric lights light the parts and terrain surfaces normally but the light also shines through parts to light other parts behind the first one. In other words, light is transmitted AND reflected. Please see my example craft with photos on Kerbal X:

https://kerbalx.com/Krazy1/why-no-part-shadows
